TopicTitle: is any one else haveing issues with cargo bays? or am i doing something wrong?

Articles.Content: so every time i try to put a lander in my drop ship the wheels clip through the floor and get my rover or well anything with wheels stuck..its so bad im about to give up on drop ships any ideas or help?

Yes, I get this too.   If you mean the 'Loading Ramp' part it seems to be if your wheels are wider than the central portion, but I haven't experimented fully.  Other than that I haven't found a work around other than do something else instead.
